Text.Heading: Introduction
Text.Paragraph: When working with SmartCards and GlobalTester there is an inherent need for some testcases to prove basic functionality of all components in the system.

This TestSpecification defines TestCases that perform checks on card and try to identify the type of card used. Some of the test cases provided here go a step further and do not only identfy the type of card but also some of it's parameters (e.g. supported protocols or available credit).
